alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:58PM MST until December 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM THURSDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, with locally higher amounts in the backcountry mountains above pass level. Lower totals of 1 to 4 inches are expected in the valley over Ketchum and Sun Valley. Winds gusting as high as 35 MPH. * WHERE...The Central Mountains west of Challis and Mackay and north of Hailey, including but not limited to Banner Summit, Stanley, Galena Summit, Ketchum, Sun Valley, and Clayton. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 11 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute Thursday. Travel may be especially difficult over mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511.idaho.gov for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
